scripts.setup:frontend: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.server: set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && cd backend && venv\Scripts\python run.py
scripts.client: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:5000 && cd frontend && npm run dev
